sentences.sContent: He delivered the speech with his usual aplomb.
sentences.sContent_eng: He delivered the speech with his usual aplomb.
sentences.sCn: 他以惯常的沉着语气作了演讲。

remMethod.val: apl(看作apple) + omb(看作tomb) → 坟墓中的苹果， 很静 → 镇静

trans.tranOther: If you do something with aplomb, you do it with confidence in a relaxed way
